supportCard.title: Support our activity
p: School++ and KOWO are independent, non-profit projects, and every month they need a livelihood: rent and utilities, salaries of administrators, repair, tea, cookies, equipment.
From monthly expenses of ~3 000 USD the half is already covered by donations of people/companies, who believe in us.
Help us to grow even faster — subscribe to a small monthly donation!

planned.title: We plan to spend these money on

viber-notifications: We will send you project reports to Viber or Telegram.
